name: The Only Tower
description:
The Only Tower is a minimalist action roguelike inspired by Dome Keeper and Vampire Survivors.

Presskit

Protect the Tower

You're the only one that can operate the Tower! Stay nearby to keep it powered up in order destroy the hordes of enemies trying to bring it down.

Upgrade the Tower, Upgrade Yourself!

Leave the comfort of the tower to pickup resources in order to upgrade the tower, weapons, and the player.

Upgrade the Enemies!?

After every wave, you'll have to choose which enemies to face next, as well as how to upgrade them. You'll have to choose carefully if you want to succeed.

Survive?

Be not afraid.

Controls Keyboard
  • Move: WASD, Arrow Keys
  • Dash: Space
Gamepad
  • Move: Left Joystick
  • Dash: Xbox: A, Playstation: X
Press/Streamer Kit

Tiny Mass Games

The Only Tower was created in association with Tiny Mass Games, a loose collective of small teams and solo developers who aim to create an exciting new game every quarter. Check out our other work at tinymassgames.com.
